project_descr: Technical Assistance to Install Alternatives, Achieve Complinace and Phase out Methyl Bromide in Fiji

outputs.output_descr:
1. Phase-out of all Methyl Bromide use in Fiji by 2010 through:  
a) Facilitating transfer of existing alternatives from other countries and adapting to local context, 
b) Conducting training programs in alternatives for fumigators and other methyl bromide users, and 
c) Training Border security officials to ensure the control of methyl bromide at the borders. 

2. Development of policy package to ensure a successful, sustainable and orderly methyl bromide phase-out.

project_title: phase out methyl bromide in fiji
